prog.title: What does the program include?
prog.subtitle: Practical knowledge to stand out.
prog.card_text1: Learn the basics to enhance your content on networks, from text effects to transitions and camera timings.
prog.card_title2: Advanced editing techniques in Adobe Premiere
prog.card_text2: Begin to deploy your tools also in sound to generate harmonious audiovisual pieces.
prog.card_title3: Advanced video editing in Adobe Premiere
prog.card_text3: Explore and acquire more tools taking into account lighting and color.
prog.card_title4: Advanced video editing in Adobe Premiere
prog.card_text4: Develop all your tools in your own project that helps you increase your income.
prog.card_text5: Acquire knowledge of advertising production of the same type as big brands.
prog.card_text6: Enter the world of 3D editing with exclusive material.
prog.card_text7: Increase your performance and ability to create viral content.

about.title: Another life is possible...
about.subtitle: You can start working remotely today
about.text1: This course will not only provide you with technical elements, but also tools applicable to any endeavor. You will learn to develop audiovisual stories, increase your contacts and offer your services effectively.
about.text2: You will have access to a winning formula.
about.text3: We have helped hundreds of professionals from different sectors, earning in dollars and setting our own times.

FAQ.faq1: Where can I ask you questions?
FAQ.ans1: You can contact us through our networks or by sending an email to ventas@mediagrowthhub.com
FAQ.faq2: If I'm at zero, will it help me?
FAQ.ans2: Our program is designed so that anyone can grow and increase their income over a thousand dollars.
FAQ.faq3: Does it work if I have social networks with little presence?
FAQ.ans3: We enhance your ability to grow on social networks and generate viral content, for yourself or third parties.
FAQ.ans4: The course experience is personalized. We want to give tools to committed people.
